name: Oyster Beds
description: Areas where oysters grow in large numbers provide valuable pearls and other underwater materials. The valuable pearls and underwater materials attract pearl divers and collectors, while the underwater environment and potential marine threats create constant danger.
atmosphere: Dense clusters of oysters carpet the seafloor while shells click and clatter with the tides. Hidden pearls make the beds valuable to divers as marine life finds shelter among the shells. Currents bring nutrients to filter-feeding mollusks. Natural pearl farms beneath the waves.
